summary: This module implements the T (π/4 phase) gate and its adjoint (T†) as standard quantum gates in Qiskit, providing their matrix definitions, decomposition rules, and singleton instances for easy inclusion in quantum circuits.
business_intent: Enable developers to apply precise π/4 phase rotations and their inverses within quantum algorithms by offering ready-to-use, efficiently represented T and T† gate objects that integrate with Qiskit's circuit construction, simulation, and transpilation workflows.
